content:
I would like to do a composite search on ServiceDefinition.useContext using its code and valueCodeableConcept elements and I have populated three SearchParameters to achieve this. Please could a knowledgeable person in the area of SearchParameters check through these and verify that I have populated them correctly. SD-UseContextConcept-SearchParameter.xmlSDuseContextCode-SearchParameter.xml SDUseContextCodeConcept-SearchParameter.xml
@Lloyd McKenzie I wondered if you could advise on this issue.
